item.title: Current Options for US Gardeners: Insect Fabrics in the Garden
item.description: Dateline: 25 August 2016 AD ProtekNet 25gr insect barrier used on hoop cloches in my garden. Inspired by the success of using a screened cloche to protect kale plants, this post explores various insect screen options for garden beds. While Agribon fabric cloches are useful for early plant growth, they can become excessively hot in summer, limit sunlight and airflow, prevent rainfall, and obscure visibility. Insect screens, on the other hand, offer superior sun, air, and rain penetration, along with better visibility.
